XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data: <Routes> <!-- Test method--> <Route Url="/Test" Method="GET" Call="Test"/> <Route Url="/receive/:owner/:repository/:namespace" Method="POST" Call="Receive"/> </Routes>

Method.name: Receive
Method.Implementation: set hook = ##class(CacheGitHubCI.Hook).%OpenId(Owner_"||"_Repository_"||"_Namespace) set st = hook.Update() set ^test($zdt($NOW(-180))) = $System.Status.GetErrorText(st) q 1
